mapper.update: UPDATE discount_product SET discount_stock = discount_stock - 1 WHERE discount_id = #{discountId} AND discount_stock > 0
mapper.select: SELECT discount_time.start_time, discount_time.end_time, discount_product.product_id,discount_product.discount_price,discount_product.discount_price, product.product_name, product.product_price, product.product_picture FROM discount_product ,product, discount_time WHERE discount_product.time_id = discount_time.time_id AND discount_product.product_id = product.product_id AND discount_product.time_id = #{timeId} AND discount_time.end_time > #{time}
